description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5mu35","text":"COVID-19 is a public health challenge requiring rapid testing for detecting infections and transmission. Nucleic acid amplification tests (NAAT) targeting SARS-CoV-2 (CoV2) are used to detect CoV2 in clinical samples.Real-time reverse transcription-quantitative PCR (RT-qPCR) is the standard NAAT for CoV2, although Reverse Transcription Loop-mediated isothermal amplification (RT-LAMP) is used in diagnostics. We show a sequence-specific RT-LAMP-based NAAT assay that is finished within 30 min using minimally processed clinical nasal swab samples and describe a fluorescent-quenched RT-LAMP assay (FQ-LAMP) using labeled primers and a quencher oligo. This assay can achieve rapid (30 min) and sensitive (1000 PFU/ml) fluorescent detection of CoV2 (WA1/2020), B.1.1.7 (Alpha), and variants of concern Delta (B.1.617.2) and Omicron (B.1.1.529) in nasal samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: FQ-LAMP, RT-LAMP, fluorescence, SARS-CoV-2, diagnostics, variant, VOC

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"blc7f","text":"mix 20ul of clinical swab material with 20 ul of SPS buffer containing Proteinase K.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d7e8u","text":"Sample is ready to use in FQ-LAMP at 2ul / 25ul reaction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5kqes","text":"Determine the number of 25ul FQ-LAMP reactions needed and add 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"34ep2","text":"Mix the following in clean tube per 25ul FQ-LAMP reaction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8g0pj","text":"2X WarmStart LAMP reagent 12.5ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ov7n","text":"10X Detection Oligo/Primer Mix 2.5ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3dvp","text":"deionized water 8ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d2f8a","text":"Dispense 23ul of FQ-LAMP master mix to each required wells of a 96 well PCR plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7j62p","text":"Add 2ul of prepared sample in SPS buffer per assay","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23dcj","text":"Centrifuge the plate to settle all contents and seal the plate with appropriate cover material. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run FQ-LAMP assay on real time PCR machine
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ddht5","text":"Set up the real time machine to measure fluorescence in the FAM channel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run FQ-LAMP assay on real time PCR machine
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cdk1i","text":"Set up the real time machine amplification program:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qcdf","text":"HOLD 65C / 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96fma","text":"HOLD 25C / 30 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi0mk","text":"measure fluorescence","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Run FQ-LAMP assay on real time PCR machine
